WorkItem.Description:
Worked fine in 2.3.5, but in 2.3.6 I only see a list of 8 gems when selecting Equip Custom Gemming.  It always seems to be 8 + an "Empty" gem option.
Â 
I haven't enabled any filters, it just doesn't seem to list all the gems.  I noticed somebody else in issue #15953 seems to have experience the same behavior (within a comment).
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Only a small list of gems showing

Comments.Message: You should enable the gem filter.

Ah, thanks.  Just found the thread http://rawr.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=81362 that explains how to do this.

My brain was a bit slow this morning and just realized it's a filter on what to Include rather than what to exclude.
